system.effect:
Target: Your Pokemon with 4 or higher Friendship and Weary. Effect: You take your Pokemon aside to encourage them. Roll a Check with any Prerequisite skill, adding the Pokemons Friendship level to the number. Rolls greater than or equal to the target DC cause the Pokemon to gain 1 Spirit. This cannot give a Pokemon Positive Spirit higher than 1.

Target DC
Weary 3 = 22
Weary 2 = 18
Weary 1 = 14
Weary 0 = 10
prerequisites: Any Adept Spirit Skill or Intimidate

ptu.prereqBackup: Three Friendship 4 Pokemon, Any Adept Spirit Skill or Intimidate
